product_overview: Vidya Vaani is a multilingual, language-agnostic chatbot designed to provide 24/7 conversational support to students, parents, and administrators in colleges and universities. It offers instant answers to FAQs via text or voice in multiple languages, accessible through web widgets and messaging platforms, operating both online and offline while ensuring data privacy and scalability.
core_goals: Provide ubiquitous, multilingual support to college stakeholders, reducing repetitive queries and workload.
Support both voice and text interaction in 5+ languages including regional languages like Hindi and Gujarati.
Deliver seamless integration on college websites and messaging platforms such as Telegram with plans for WhatsApp.
Enable offline functionality for uninterrupted service with fallback translation capabilities.
Ensure data privacy, system maintainability, and scalable deployment across multiple institutions.
key_features: Multilingual support with automatic language detection and translation using fastText and MarianMT/Google Translate APIs.
Voice input/output via Speech-to-Text and Text-to-Speech technologies (Whisper/Google STT).
Smart document ingestion and analysis using OCR (Tesseract), NLP parsing (spaCy), and semantic search with embeddings (SentenceTransformers) and vector databases (FAISS/pgvector).
Proactive personalized notifications about exams, scholarships, and updates through web widgets, Telegram bots, and offline apps.
Admin dashboard for analytics, content management, feedback loops, and privacy-aware logging.
High availability with offline modes including cached FAQs and escalation to human support when queries remain unresolved.
user_flow_summary: User submits query via text or voice in any supported language on college website widget or Telegram bot.
System detects query language and translates if necessary.
Intent detection and contextual understanding occur via Rasa NLU.
Semantic search retrieves relevant documents from vector store based on embeddings.
LLM generates a response combining retrieved context and rule-based logic.
Response is provided back in user's original language with TTS for voice output if applicable.
User can rate the response; unresolved queries escalate to human staff.
Administrative users access dashboard for analytics, content updates, and monitoring anonymized logs.
validation_criteria: System supports at least five languages with accurate language detection and translation.
Voice and text inputs are correctly processed and responded to within 2 seconds under normal load.
Document ingestion correctly processes PDFs and FAQs with >95% OCR accuracy and semantic search relevance.
System maintains 99.9% uptime with offline fallback operational when disconnected from cloud.
Admin dashboard features must allow non-technical users to update FAQs and view analytics without errors.
User feedback mechanism works reliably, with unresolved queries properly flagged and escalated.
Privacy standards are met with anonymized logs and sensitive data redaction implemented.

features.name: Chat Text API
features.description: Handles text-based chat interactions, including language detection, translation, NLU, RAG, and LLM response generation.

features.name: Chat Voice API
features.description: Handles voice-based chat interactions, transcribing audio and then processing it via the Chat Text API.

features.name: Documents API
features.description: Manages document-related operations (e.g., upload, list, delete).

features.name: Admin API
features.description: Provides administrative functionalities for the application.
